    • Method Detail

      • getImageName

        public java.lang.String getImageName()
        Retrieve the image label selected by the proposer at the start of the game.
        Returns:
        String - Image label name

      • addPlayers

        public void addPlayers​(Player guesser,
                       Player proposer)
        Called when the party is ready to enter into Party.PartyStatus.READY_TO_PLAY
        Parameters:
        guesser - Player
        proposer - Player
        See Also:
        Party.PartyStatus

      • setImage

        public void setImage​(java.lang.String image,
                     int imageCount)
        Sets the current image label name to store the right answer and maximum image segments.
        Parameters:
        image - String - Image label
        imageCount - Integer - Image segment count

      • nextRound

        public void nextRound()
        Sets each player's status to indicate that a new round started and resets current guesses for this round to zero.

      • checkAnswer

        public boolean checkAnswer​(java.lang.String guess)
        Checks if the answer is correct. If the guesser guessed more than three times the round ends. The game ends if the answer is correct.

      • giveUp

        public void giveUp()
        Starts the next round with a point penalty of five.

      • chooseSegment

        public void chooseSegment​(java.lang.String segmentID)
        Chooses new segment for new round
        Parameters:
        segmentID - String - ID of the new segment chosen by the proposer

      • receiveUpdatesFromFront

        public void receiveUpdatesFromFront​(Party party,
                                    SocketMessage message)
        Performs game logic when a player in the party has performed a game action.
        Parameters:
        party - Party - The party of players this game belongs to
        message - SocketMessage - The input sent by each user

      • update

        public void update()
        Sequential update that changes the state of the game based on the game status and increments the game time. Execution is performed sequentially by a TickExecution object.
        See Also:
        TickExecution

      • getScore

        public int getScore()
        Calculates the score based on time, chosen segments and segment request penalties and returns it
        Returns:
        Integer - The calculated score

      • getTime

        public int getTime()

      • getGuesserSegments

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getGuesserSegments()
        Retrieve a list of all the segments visible to the guesser.
        Returns:
        Array list of the segments

      • getProposerSegments

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getProposerSegments()

      • getCurrentState

        public GameLogic.GameState getCurrentState()
        Retrieve the current state of the game.
        See Also:
        GameLogic.GameState

      • isFinished

        public boolean isFinished()
        Return a boolean indicating if the game is finished
